title: FidelityFX Super Resolution
description: AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution (FSR) is an open source, high-quality solution for producing high resolution frames from lower resolution inputs.
longDescription:
AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution is a high-quality Spatial Upscaler, and can provide significant performance benefits to a project without introducing much risk into development or content pipelines. FSR uses a collection of cutting-edge algorithms with a particular emphasis on creating high-quality edges. FSR enables “practical performance” for costly render operations, such as hardware ray tracing.

FSR supports a wide variety of GPUs, is freely distributed, and is fully open-source. This plugin integrates FSR into Unreal Engine 4 as of version 4.27.1 (or higher).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Generates high quality renders at a fraction of the performance cost.
  • Includes built-in sharpening.
  • Includes built-in handling for HDR display configurations.
  • Fully open-source, and highly configurable to meet the needs of your project.
  • Real-time support for in-editor workflows, as well as packaged builds.


Code Modules:

  •  FSR (Runtime)
  •  FSRSpatialUpscaling (Runtime)


Number of C++ Classes: 13

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64-bit

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64-bit, XBox Series X|S

Documentation: 4.27 Plugin | Unreal Upscaling
